== Nannambra (CT) (627555) ==

Nannambra (CT) is a town in the [[Tirurangadi]] taluka of [[Malappuram]] district with an area of 18.35 sq. km. and harbouring 6984 households with total population of 40543 as per the 2011 Census. The district headquarter [[Malappuram]] is at a distance of 30 km. The state headquarter [[Thiruvananthapuram]] is at a distance of 400 km. Male population is 19048 and female population is 21495. Scheduled Caste population is 1066 and Scheduled Tribes population is 48. Census Location Code of the town is 627555<ref>http://www.censusindia.gov.in/2011census/dchb/DCHB.html</ref>.

Population wise class of the town is Class III (population_total 20,000 to 49,999).
The civic status of the town is 'Census Town'.

The nearest city with population more than 1 lakh is Malappuram (m + og) at a distance of 30 km. The nearest city with population more than 5 lakh is Kozhikode (m corp. + og) at a distance of 25 km. Railway station is at Tanur at a distance of 6 km.
